item.title: Young tree needs support., 18th September
item.description:
Young "Chinese Lantern" tree supporting tapes have broken. Repair needed to prevent damage to tree from strong winds. Located in Alexandra Recreation Ground Penge between the Lodge and old paddling pool area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westbourne Road, Penge, London

item.title: Mattress and board dumped outside primary school, 18th September
item.description:
A single bed mattress and headboard have been dumped outside of Jubilee Primary School and the houses next to it, on the footpath connected to Crowded Way. They have been there at least 2 months now and only getting worse as the rain starts falling more often. Despite the heavy foot traffic, other rubbish frequently gets fly-tipped along here as it avoids line of sight from the nearby houses.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crowden Way, London
Report on FixMyStreet
